Articles.Content:
Are devote Tuesdays not happening anymore? I can't find anything to say as much, but wa wondering of they have been cancelled due to ksp now being a full game. Same goes for other things on the tumbler place thing, modding mondays and various other weekly posts have stopped. Any ideas as to why? 

 - Sam
Probably just a break from the 1.0.x rush.
Also, yesterday was a national holiday in Mexico.

They should be back to regular schedule, next week.

Maxmaps said in last Friday's Squadcast, that they might have interesting stuff to talk about, following their weeklong meeting/party, this Friday.

Lets give them a little time to unwind. They deserve it!

Eventually, I do however would like to know what's up with the future of KSP and Squad.

Squad told us they will keep developping, but in what way is what I would like to know.

I think the contant stream of updates, blogs, announcements and posts will gradually decline in both number and frequency, but a final word about this will be nice.

Friday was Labor day, yesterday was 5 de Mayo and they are having some short of 1.0 celebration party in MÃƒÂ©xico so it is understandable.

Knowing how passionate the community can be some official words would be appreciated but i think they deserve a week of drinking eating, sleeping and jumping from a plane.

Even without cinco de mayo, and regardless what we think of the outcome of the process, getting to 1.0 must have been a mad rush and I'm sure a detox period of one or two weeks would be beneficial for the devs, the game, and thus for us.

Holidays, release party (and detox), sky diving, catching up on sleep and planning ahead.

I'm amazed that there's actually been some responses from Squad employees at all since launch.

I for one is busy kicking the, erh tires, on 1.0.2, and can happily wait another week for them to find the keys to the office.
Ah, they were in "Meetings" all day on May 5th in Mexico... \*wink\*

Is it too early to start the 1.1 hype train? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

However great release are, I just cant wait for another update, the sign of a great game i suppose.

 - Sam
We all know they are sitting in the office trying to finish the Prison Break Heist in GTA 5 Online during their much needed break/celebration!
I assume that they're all having a bit of a break.
Well, they are all in Mexico, so I expect tequila is involved.

> 
> Well, they are all in Mexico, so I expect tequila is involved.

Tell them to share and send some of that tequila this way! We all know that Jeb flies better with a good margarita in hand ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
As my wife found out: "1 tequila, 2 tequila, 3 tequila, floor!"
What if the devs are actually ***playing*** KSP! (For fun)

I would think that they know some secret cheat codes? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

seriously though, i doubt it, i would be sick of it if i was them!

 - Sam
They haven't stopped making the Devnotes. They just came out with a big release and have not yet done much toward the next version yet, so there's not much to report right now.
